Package org.infogrid.comm

Communications primitives.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    BidirectionalMessageEndpoint<T>
    A message endpoint for bidirectional communications.
    CarriesInvocationId
    An interface supported by Messages that need to keep track of invocations, such as for Remote Procedure Calls.
    MessageEndpoint<T>
    A message endpoint that does not specify whether it can send or receive messages or both.
    MessageEndpointListener<T>
    Listener interface for events emitted by a BidirectionalMessageEndpoint.
    ReceivingMessageEndpoint<T>
    A message endpoint for receiving messages.
    SendingMessageEndpoint<T>
    A message endpoint for sending messages.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractFireAndForgetSendingMessageEndpoint<T>
    Factors out functionality common to many SendingMessageEndpoint implementations that use a "fire and forget" model.
    AbstractFireAndForgetSendingMessageEndpoint.ResendTask
    The resend task.
    AbstractFireAndForgetSendingMessageEndpoint.SendTask
    The send task.
    AbstractMessageEndpointListener<T>
    Makes implementing MessageEndpointListeners easier.
    AbstractSendingMessageEndpoint<T>
    Factors out functionality common to many SendingMessageEndpoint implementations.
    AbstractSendingMessageEndpoint.EventType<T>
    Captures the types of events that can be sent to the listeners.
    AbstractSendingMessageEndpoint.TimedTask
    The task to perform actions later, such as the resending of messages that could not be delivered.
    AbstractWaitingEndpoint<T extends CarriesInvocationId>
    Factors out functionality common to communications endpoint that wait for responses.
    ReturnSynchronizerEndpoint<T extends CarriesInvocationId>
    An communication endpoint that notifies a ReturnSynchronizer when a received response to a sent message has arrived.
    RpcClientEndpoint<A,R,T extends CarriesInvocationId>
    An abstract communications endpoint for Remote-Procedure-Style communications.
    WaitForResponseEndpoint<T extends CarriesInvocationId>
    A communication endpoint that suspends the thread sending a message until a response has arrived.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    MessageEndpointIsDeadException
    This subclass of MessageSendException indicates that the MessageEndpoint is dead.
    MessageSendException
    Thrown if a Message could not be sent.

Package org.infogrid.comm Description

Communications primitives.
